# Antifraud & Antidetect Knowledge Base
# Author: Vektor T13
# Last Updated: 2026-02-08
# Total Lessons: 15

> This knowledge base contains transcribed webinars about antifraud systems,
> browser fingerprinting, VM detection, VPN/proxy detection, and anonymity.
> Use for reference when developing antifraud/antidetect solutions.

## Quick Reference

### Key Insights
- Benchmark > Hash: Performance measurement beats hash spoofing
- SOCKS5 is dying: M1D (TCP+UDP) detects it 100%
- DNS = Fingerprint: Shared between Google, banks, Meta via M3AAWG
- Public checkers = Honeypots: BrowserLeaks, fingerprint.com collect data

---

## Browser Fingerprinting

### Canvas Fingerprint
> /antifraud-course/09-canvas-fake-of-fakes.md
- CPU Canvas has ~400 variants, antidetects don't distinguish
- 10 years of fake detection evolution
- GPU vs CPU rendering differences

### WebGL Fingerprint
> /antifraud-course/05-webgl-fingerprint.md
- FPS benchmark more important than hash
- 43-48 FPS = VM/VPS/Bot detection
- Performance-based identification

### WebGPU (New System)
> /antifraud-course/03-webgpu-new-system.md
> /antifraud-course/04-webgpu-performance.md
- WebGL deprecated, WebGPU replacing
- Atomic Fingerprint 70% accuracy
- V-Sec 2025 implementation

### Audio Fingerprint
> /antifraud-course/08-audiocontext.md
- Actually CPU fingerprint, not audio
- 45-50ms timing = VM/VPS detection
- AudioContext API abuse

### WebAssembly Fingerprint
> /antifraud-course/07-webassembly-fingerprint.md
- 99% accuracy identification
- Used by Microsoft, CyberSource
- PerimeterX early stage

### Browser FM (Full Metrics)
> /antifraud-course/06-browser-fm.md
- 16000 parameters collected
- Fuzzy Hashing for comparison
- 99.7% accuracy

---

## Network Fingerprinting

### DNS as Identifier
> /antifraud-course/02-dns-identifier.md
- DNS fingerprint same as IP
- M3AAWG, FS-ISAC data sharing
- Proxy warmup required

### M1D / M1D1 Protocol Analysis
> /antifraud-course/10-m1d-m1d1.md
- TCP: 60% OS identification (Zardax)
- M1D (TCP+UDP): 100% SOCKS5 detection
- M1D1 (TCP+UDP+QUIC): 95% user identification
- SOCKS5 will die, need full protocol support

---

## VPN & Proxy Detection

### 10 Geolocation Methods
> /antifraud-course/12_VPN_Detection_Geolocation.md
- IP-based, ASN, Traceroute/TTL
- DNS leaks, Timezone, Language
- WebRTC, JavaScript API, IPv6 leaks
- WiFi BSSID geolocation
- Maxmind is the source of truth

### Cloud AntiDetect Router
> /antifraud-course/14_Cloud_AntiDetect_Router.md
- OpenWRT on VPS for proxification
- Proper MTU 1500, IPv6, WebRTC, QUIC
- Better than software proxifiers
- GitHub open source project

---

## Anonymity & Deanonymization

### Ultimate Anonymity 2026
> /antifraud-course/13_Anonymity_Deanonymization.md
- 4 blocks: Browser, Hardware, Network, Crypto
- Balaclava principle: excessive anonymity = uniqueness
- Corporate browsers unsafe (Chrome, Firefox, Edge)
- Ungoogled Chrome recommended
- Ultrasonic beacons for tracking
- TPM chips, Apple Secure Enclave

---

## Virtual Machine Detection

### VM Detection & Bypass
> /antifraud-course/15_VM_Detection_Bypass.md
- VirtualBox OSE best for hiding (open source)
- VMWare has backdoor (port 5658)
- CPUID hypervisor bit
- Kernel/drivers hardest to bypass
- Anticheat = most advanced detection
- WebGPU support in Antidetect 5

---

## Antifraud Systems Analysis

### Chase Bank (ThreatMetrix + Akamai)
> /antifraud-course/01-chase-antifraud.md
- ThreatMetrix TURN protocol
- Akamai IP reputation, latency
- HAR analysis methodology

### Free Enterprise Antifraud
> /antifraud-course/11-free-antifraud-system.md
- IPQS Enterprise free via Indeed
- How to access paid features

---

## Tools Mentioned

| Tool | Purpose |
|------|---------|
| chrome://net-export | Network traffic logging |
| netlog-viewer | QUIC/UDP analysis |
| TCP Optimizer | Network parameters |
| DNS Benchmark | DNS server testing |
| DetectExpert | Author's checkers |
| HAR Export | Request analysis |

---

## Full Transcripts

Available in /antifraud-course/transcripts/:
- .txt - plain text
- .json - with timestamps
- .srt/.vtt - subtitles

---

# How to Use

For Claude Code: fetch specific .md files based on context:
```
WebFetch("https://mazamaka.github.io/notes/antifraud-course/12_VPN_Detection_Geolocation.md")
```

For search: use keywords from this index to find relevant sections.
